title: Trainer of Trainers (TOT) Program for Strengthening Healthcare Workforce Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment using digital devices (tablets/laptops), verifying field applicability through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement three or more effective instructional strategies for medical education training.
Learners can collaboratively develop and demonstrate educational modules for solving medical field problems in team-based settings.
Learners can propose methods for creating and evaluating educational content using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
